title: The following provisions shall only be applicable in case of rehab and composite building
clause_text: The following provisions shall only be applicable in case of rehab and composite building. Composite building in Rehab scheme is the building where the rehab component is equal to or more than 50%. Notwithstanding the provisions contained in sub-Regulations (2) of this Regulation,
